name: Microkars
description:
A 3D mini-toy racing game made with Godot game engine.

It is an entry for a "small player in big world challenge" from SoloCode Godot Engine discord.

Drive the mini-toy car on the table.

Avoid the forks, plates and spoons and try to do the best lap and beat your own ghost!

Controls  : 

Arrow keys : Drive

TAB : Respawn

Space bar : Change view (Third or fisrt person views)

F : Switch fullscreen / windowed mode

ESC : Return to menu / Quit

You can also use a controller.

Languages : French or English (Clic on the flag to change language at home screen)
